data.title: Hey, Girl Lyrics
meta_keywords: Girl Song MP3 by The Blasters
data.meta_description: Hey, Girl Lyrics by The Blasters. Now, listen to all your favourite songs, along with the lyrics, only on JioSaavn.
data.text:
Hey, girl, don′t you stay gone long Don't you keep me hangin′ on Come back where you belong Girl, don't you stay gone long Hey, girl, don't you stay gone long Don′t you keep me hangin′ on I hope you're feelin′ my heart grieves Girl, don't you stay gone long See by the river where I carved your name The birds would sing everyday But when you left me The wind in the trees blew the birds away Hey, girl, don′t you stay gone long Don't you keep me hangin′ on Come back where you belong Girl, don't you stay gone long Hey, girl, don't you stay gone long Don′t you keep me hangin′ on Come back where you belong Girl, don't you stay gone long Hey, girl, don′t you stay gone long Don't you keep me hangin′ on I hope you're playin′ my heart's a-singin' Girl, don′t you stay gone long The evening sun always set in the west Shine at my back door But when you left me, I can barely see that it Don′t shine in no more Hey, girl, don't you stay gone long Don′t you keep me hangin' on Come back where you belong Girl, don′t you stay gone long Hey, girl, don't you stay gone long Don′t you keep me hangin' on Come back where you belong Girl, don't you stay gone long Girl, don′t you stay gone long Girl, don′t you stay gone long Writer(s): Robert John Lange, Shania Twain
Lyrics powered by www.musixmatch.com
